person.persName: John D. Hardwick (Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer and hotelkeeper)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer and hotelkeeper. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy C. Hardwick. Father of Sarah E. Hardwick, Minvera L. Hardwick, Mary J. Hardwick, Nancy D. Hardwick, Victoria Hardwick, Frances G. Hardwick, John G. Hardwick, and Ambrose Hardwick. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Hotelkeeper in Madisonville in 1860. Employed Thomas R. Cardwell as a barkeeper in Madisonville in 1860.
